Social impact

At Fire and Lion we believe that every book has a mission: that is, every story has the power and responsibility to change the world. That mission is clearest when we work with social-impact projects and organisations, like MyConstitution, Book Dash, Worldreader, Bettercare, and the More Books Campaign.

In partnership with Electric Book Works and the CSIR we’re creating a public-domain version of the Constitution in all eleven official South African languages. Read more.

The More Books Campaign, supported by the Publisher’s Association of South Africa, was an advocacy initiative aimed at influencing public opinion on textbook regulations. Read more.

Non-profit healthcare publisher Bettercare replies on Fire and Lion to develop and maintain its library of open-access textbooks as books, ebooks and a website. Read more.

Book Dash publishes a range of children’s books in many languages, and worked with Worldreader and Fire and Lion to turn these into HTML and ebooks that could be read on any device. Read more.
